profile.name: Łukasz Langa
profile.headline: @psf Senior Software Engineer | Open Source Enthusiast | Poznań, Poland
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for open-source development. Proficient in building tools for various platforms, including macOS/iOS and Node.js. Strong interest in exploring new technologies like WebAssembly and Foreign Function Interface packages.

experience.title: @psf Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented a high-performance caching system for a large-scale web application.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and maintain multiple open-source projects, including Python and C libraries.
Developed and maintained tools for automating testing and deployment processes.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects, including Python and C libraries.
Provided detailed explanations of fixes and acknowledged contributions from others in the comment history.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for various clients, including web applications and mobile apps.
Collaborated with clients to understand their requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
